players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob's death is shocking. We need to stay calm and figure out who could have done this. Does anyone have any information or suspicions?"
Charlie: "Last night, I investigated Alice and discovered she is the mafioso."
Diana: "Charlie, why should we believe your claim over Alice? What if you're the mafioso trying to frame her?"

Charlie: "Consider the fact that Bob was killed last night, and I was the one who revealed Alice's identity immediately. If I were the mafioso, wouldn't it make more sense to eliminate the detective first?"
You: "Charlie, your logic is flawed. If you were a detective, revealing your role so early makes you an easy target. It seems more likely you're a desperate mafioso trying to deflect suspicion."
